participant_1.background:
I want to learn how to manage my diabetes better so that I can continue to enjoy my work and my life.
I like driving my red Impala.
my favorite team is the raptors.
i want people to think i am cool.
I am passionate about capturing the beauty of the world around me, even when I'm not feeling well.

participant_2.background:
I binged on British shows and movies while I was confined to my bed on vacation.
I bump into things because I am too focused on my thoughts.
i am a carefree , funloving , free spirited person.
i enjoy john grisham movies , but not his books.
i enjoy cold winters and strong breezes.

content.text: Nothing much.  I was bingeing on British shows and movies while I was confined to my bed on vacation.
I got a bad cold and stayed in bed for a few days.  I really enjoyed the shows and movies though.
That is good!  I am glad you found some enjoyment while you were sick.
I like photography and sports.  I also have diabetes and am learning how to manage it better.
That is really cool!  I have always wanted to learn how to take better photos.  And, I am sorry to hear about your diabetes.  I hope you are doing well with it.
Thanks!  I am doing well.  I am learning a lot and am feeling more in control of my condition.  And, photography is really fun!  It is a great way to capture the beauty of the world around you.
That sounds great!  I am glad to hear that you are doing well with your diabetes.  And, photography does sound like a lot of fun.  I will have to look into learning more about it.
Definitely!  It is a great hobby.  And, you can do it anywhere!
That is awesome!  I will definitely look into it.
Great!  I hope you enjoy it!
Thanks!  I am sure I will!
